paper_abstract: Security in component-based software applications is studied by looking at information leakage from one component to another through operation calls. Components and security specifications about confidentiality as regular languages are modelled. Then a systematic way is provided to synthesise an access control mechanism, which not only guarantees all specifications to be obeyed, but also allows each user to attain maximum permissive behaviours.
paper_title: Language-based access control approach for component-based software applications
